channel.title: Item's Aren't lost upon death....?
channel.description: Hey umm, I just recently downloaded Dragon-History X 317 source. It was all good until someone told me you don't lose items in the wild, how do I change this? Any help is appreciated, so I'll love you long time if you help me (:

item.title: Item's Aren't lost upon death....?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Check to see if the method that handles items lost is called within the death method.

Read full topic
